attributes.action: create a system of codified law similar to the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, written law consists of a mass of statutes which act as standalone texts. We could replace this with a codified system of law in the UK similar to that of the USA, where all Acts are written into a logical section of a complete system of codified law. This code would contain a full set of logical Chapters and subsections. As a result, locating the source of written law would become easier.

This system could be extended to include unwritten common law principles as interpreted in legal cases. However, there would have to be a way of reconciling any differences in the common law between England and Wales and Scotland.
